@1@ Default constructor: value-initializes the {{tt|OuterAlloc}} base class and the inner allocator member object, if used by the implementation.

@2@ Constructs the base class {{tt|OuterAlloc}} from {{c|std::forward&lt;OuterA2&gt;(outerAlloc)}}, and the inner allocators with {{c|innerAllocs...}}. {{cpp/enable_if|{{c|std::is_constructible&lt;OuterAlloc, OuterA2&gt;::value}} is {{c|true}}}}.

@3@ Copy-constructor: initializes each allocator from the corresponding allocator of {{c|other}}.

@4@ Move-constructor: moves each allocator from the corresponding allocator of {{c|other}} into {{c|*this}}.

@5@ Initializes each allocator from the corresponding allocator of {{c|other}}. {{cpp/enable_if|{{c|std::is_constructible&lt;OuterAlloc, const OuterA2&amp;&gt;::value}} is {{c|true}}}}.

@6@ Initializes each allocator from the corresponding allocator of {{c|other}}, using move semantics. {{cpp/enable_if|{{c|std::is_constructible&lt;OuterAlloc, OuterA2&gt;::value}} is {{c|true}}}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|outerAlloc|constructor argument for the outer allocator}}
{{par|innerAllocs...|constructor arguments for the inner allocators}}

{{par end}}
